org.educraft

Class EduCraft

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.educraft.EduCraft

  • public class EduCraft
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class for the entire EduCraft mod. This class is responsible for instantiating every custom-made item and block we want to make available for players in-game.

      • tabEduCraft

        public static net.minecraft.creativetab.CreativeTabs tabEduCraft
        Defines a customised inventory tab for use in creative mode, to collect all the EduCraft items together.

      • MAX_NUMBER

        public static final int MAX_NUMBER
        The maximum number players are allowed to obtain. Used to prevent players trying to get numbers we don't have textures for.
        See Also:
